feed.title: lumin’s page
feed.subtitle:
hi there, my name is lumin shi.
i am a member of cloudflare's traffic engineering team.
my main research interest is in computer networking.
you can find my cv here. :)

entry.title: Updating my web page
entry.content:
My GitHub page’s latest update was made in March 2021, whoops. Obviously, the page needs a much-needed update; you are looking at it now. This post is a quick update about me.

So, I completed graduate school in Oregon early last year. I am currently a systems engineer in Cloudflare’s traffic engineering team. It has been an excellent experience for me so far. I appreciate that: 1) I have friendly and competent colleagues, and 2) I get to work on interesting problems that can positively affect a large network on the Internet.

Apart from my work life, my wife and I are settling in the same city after many years of a long-distance relationship!

With the above, I conclude my first post on my updated website. XD
entry.summary: My GitHub page’s latest update was made in March 2021, whoops. Obviously, the page needs a much-needed update; you are looking at it now. This post is a quick update about me.
